serverMessage.Chatbot-Error.指令处理失败: Failed to process command input from user {{SessionId}}:
serverMessage.Chatbot-Error.添加命令失败.缺少键: Failed to add command {{CommandType}}, missing Key property

Command processing failed: {{ErrorMessage}}

serverMessage.CmdUtil-Error.参数键为空: Parameter key {{KeyName}} cannot be null or empty
serverMessage.CmdUtil-Error.参数验证.Value为空: Parameter {{ValueName}} not entered or is empty
serverMessage.CmdUtil-Error.参数验证.属性ManagerChat为空: Parameter instance not initialized correctly: missing ManagerChat property
serverMessage.CmdUtil-Error.用户未注册或者Session已失效: User not registered or session has expired: {{ErrorMessage}}
serverMessage.CustomStaticRouter-Error.InjectableClass: InjectableClasses did not correctly inject ModConfig property

serverMessage.CustomStaticRouter-Error.无法通过PlayerId获取玩: Unable to get player account ID via playerId

serverMessage.CustomStaticRouter-Info.对局结束.已记录: Raid end recorded: {{ServerId}}, SessionId: {{SessionId}}, Results: {{ Result: {{ResultsResult}}, ExitName: {{ResultsExitName}}, PlayTime: {{ResultsPlayTime}} }}, LocationTransit: {{LocationTransit}}, Items taken out of raid: {{ItemsTakeOutCount}}
serverMessage.DataGetter-Error.索引超出记录数量范围: Index {{Index}} is out of record count range: [0, {{RecordCount}})
serverMessage.I18N-Info.撤离点数据加载完毕: Extraction point data loaded ({{MapCount}} maps total, {{ExitCount}} extraction points total)
serverMessage.I18N-Warn.撤离点名称不存在: Warning: Extraction point {{ExitName}} does not exist in SPT localization dictionary
serverMessage.I18N-Warn.重复添加撤离点: Warning: Map {{MapName}} data already contains extraction point {{ExitName}}, addition failed
serverMessage.Json-Error.反序列化出错并备份文件: Error during Json deserialization of record file {{OriginalFilePath}}: {{ErrorMessage}}, file will be backed up to {{FilePath}}
serverMessage.Json-Error.反序列化文件结果为null: Json deserialization of file {{FilePath}} resulted in null
serverMessage.PriceSystem-Warn.ItemHelper.GetItemPrice: Unable to get handbook/prices.json price for {{ItemId}}
serverMessage.RecordManager-Error.保存记录数据库时账户Id未找到: Account ID: {{AccountId}} not found when saving record database, please ensure records for this account have been saved before
serverMessage.RecordManager-Error.指定的玩家账号不存在: Account ID for player {{PlayerId}} not found when creating record, please ensure records for this player account exist
serverMessage.RecordManager-Error.数据库文件版本过时: Error occurred while trying to deserialize data file {{FilePath}} with version {{CurrVersion}}: {{ErrorMessage}}, will attempt to migrate database
serverMessage.RecordManager-Error.记录数据库文件夹不存在: Record database file path not obtained correctly, please ensure the `db\records` folder path exists
serverMessage.RecordManager-Error.记录数据库文件夹不存在.Load: Record database folder path "{{RecordDbPath}}" unexpectedly does not exist when loading, please ensure the `db\records` folder path exists, load failed
serverMessage.RecordManager-Error.记录数据库文件夹不存在.Save: Record database file path "{{RecordDbPath}}" unexpectedly does not exist when saving, please ensure the `db\records` folder path exists, save failed
serverMessage.RecordManager-Info.数据库迁移完成: Database migration completed, migrated {{OldFile}} to {{NewFile}}, old version file will be deleted
serverMessage.RecordManager-Warn.保存数据库时账户Id不一致: Account ID mismatch when saving record database, database account ID has been changed from {{OldId}} to: {{NewId}}
serverMessage.RecordManager-Warn.创建记录时存在缓存->归档缓存: Record cache for player {{PlayerId}} is not empty when creating record, cache has been directly archived

translations.Cmd-Buy.BuyList.快购列表.表头: - Index | Faction | Map | Profit | Losses | Equipment Value | Item Count | Play Time | Kills | Result | Quick Buy Price

translations.Cmd-Buy.BuyList.没有任何快购列表: You have no quick purchase lists, please complete raids to record entry equipment
translations.Cmd-Buy.BuyList.没有找到指定页的记录: Could not find your quick purchase list entries from {{StartIndex}} to {{EndIndex}}, supported index range: {{IndexRange}}
translations.Cmd-Buy.BuyList.获取对局结果信息时出错: Error occurred while trying to get raid result information from local database
translations.Cmd-Buy.Desc: Used to quickly purchase all equipment used upon entering a specified raid. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Buy.Error.卢布不够或者购买时出现错误: Not enough rubles or purchase error: {{ErrorMessage}}
translations.Cmd-Buy.Error.无法获取到Pmc存档信息: Unable to get Pmc profile information via SessionId
translations.Cmd-Buy.Error.没有获取到已记录的有效装备数据: No valid recorded equipment data obtained, specified raid equipment count is 0 or total value is 0
translations.Cmd-Buy.Success.您已购买装备: You have purchased equipment for raid with index {{Index}} (ServerId: {{ServerId}}), cost {{TotalPrice}}rub, total {{EquipmentCount}} items
translations.Cmd-Cls.已清除聊天记录: Cleared {{Count}} chat records, will take effect after restarting the game client
translations.Cmd-Cls.找不到聊天记录: Could not find your chat records
translations.Cmd-Help.Desc: Gets help information for all commands. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Help.显示文本: Help (Parameters need to be written as key-value pairs, e.g., "list index 1"; square brackets indicate optional parameters; commands and parameters are case-insensitive):
translations.Cmd-Info.Desc: Get detailed raid record using index or serverId (at least one parameter required). Usage:
translations.Cmd-Info.本局击杀信息: {{VictimTime}} Eliminated {{VictimName}} (Level: {{VictimLevel}} Faction: {{VictimSide}} Role: {{VictimRole}}) {{VictimDistance}}m away by hitting {{BodyPart}} with {{WeaponName}}
translations.Cmd-Items.Desc: Get detailed item information for a specified raid record where the absolute value of item value change is within the range [ge, le], using an index. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Items.物品表头: Item Name   Unit Price(rub) * Mod = Total Value(rub)   Description
translations.Cmd-List.Desc: Get all your raid history records that match the conditions. Usage:
translations.Cmd-List.历史战绩.表头: - Index | Faction | Map | Entry Value | Profit | Equipment Value | Losses | Play Time | Kills | Result
translations.Cmd-List.历史战绩.表头长度不一致: Please check if the header is correctly separated by '|', current header separator count: {{ActualColCount}}, theoretical column count: {{TheoreticalColCount}}
translations.Cmd-List.没有任何历史战绩: You have no raid history, please complete at least one raid before querying
translations.Cmd-List.没有找到指定页的记录: Could not find your raid history entries from {{StartIndex}} to {{EndIndex}}, supported index range: {{IndexRange}}
translations.Cmd-List.获取对局结果信息时出错: Error occurred while trying to get raid result information from local database
translations.Cmd-Price.Desc: Used to view item prices. Usage:
translations.Cmd-Price.Error.无效的tpl: Invalid template ID: {{TplId}}, please check if the parameter is correct
translations.Cmd-Price.Error.缺少参数: Missing all parameters when using the price command, please refer to the help command prompt, provide at least one parameter
translations.Cmd-Price.name结果: - Item Name: {{Name}} Item Template ID: {{TplId}} Market Average Unit Price: {{AvgPrice}}rub Dynamic Price: {{DynPrice}}rub Handbook Price: {{HandbookPrice}}rub Similarity Score: {{Similarity}}
translations.Cmd-Price.tpl结果: Item Template ID: {{TplId}} Item Name: {{Name}} Market Average Unit Price: {{AvgPrice}}rub Dynamic Price: {{DynPrice}}rub Handbook Price: {{HandbookPrice}}rub
translations.Cmd-参数化简述.Items.ge: Specifies the threshold greater than or equal to the absolute value of item value change to be displayed, defaults to 0
translations.Cmd-参数化简述.Items.le: Specifies the threshold less than or equal to the absolute value of item value change to be displayed, defaults to double.MaxValue
translations.Cmd-参数化简述.Items.mode:
Supports "change" (default) or "all", case-insensitive
'change' only shows added, discarded, or changed item data; 'all' is similar to the old version showing items taken in and out
translations.Cmd-参数化简述.limit: Specifies the maximum number to display per page
translations.Cmd-参数化简述.list: Add `list` or `ls` at the end of the buy command to view the list of raid records eligible for quick purchase
translations.Cmd-参数化简述.page: Specifies the page number to display
translations.Cmd-参数化简述.preview: Add `preview` or `pv` at the end of the buy command to view the quick purchase item list without buying directly
translations.Cmd-参数简述.name: Item name
translations.Cmd-参数简述.top: Specifies the maximum number of search results
translations.Record-元数据.入场信息: Entry Equipment Value: {{EquipmentValue}}rub, Secure Container Value: {{SecuredValue}}rub, Total Entry Value: {{PreRaidValue}}rub
translations.Record-元数据.地图与存活时间: Map: {{MapName}} Survival Time: {{PlayTime}} Kill Count: {{KillCount}} Headshot Kill Rate: {{HeadshotKillRate}}
translations.Record-元数据.对局结果: Raid Result: {{Result}} Extraction Point: {{ExitName}} Play Style: {{SurvivorClass}}
translations.Record-元数据.退出信息: Value Taken Out: {{GrossProfit}}rub, Losses {{CombatLosses}}rub, Net Profit {{NetProfit}}rub
